name: Crate Madness (jinxedbyte)
description:
CRATE MADNESS

Contribution to Trijam 147

 Theme: Just destroying stuff

You find yourself in a warehouse full of crates. While you try to make your way to the exit you see that there are valuable items in the crates, but also bombs. Catch as many items as fast as you can.

Controls / Gameplay

  • Click on a crate to destroy it and find the content
  • Click on a coin to pick it up and gain score
  • Click on a ring to pick it up and gain even more score
  • Click on staris to go down one level
  • Click on a bomb to let it explode.
  • When the bomb explodes, it do the following to an adjacent...
    • crate: will be destoryed and reveal its item
    • coin: will be destroyed and you won't get the score
    • ring: will be destoryed and you won't get the score
    • stairs: will be executed and you will go down
    • another bomb: will explode instantly
  • Time is up after 60 seconds

Assets used

  • "Game Assets 3"  by Kenney: various sprites and sound effects
  • Aseprite for own adjustments
  • 8 Bit Click by estudiocafofo
  • Chiptunes Music by CyberLeaf

Unfortunately, I could not work on any level progression system due to lack of time.

Please let me know your thoughts and highscore in the comments.
